text: ah, we do not have archive functionality at this time. Either you can delete the row after taking a backup or make the hs_path column empty so that dynamic page for that row will not be generated.

Hi all. I am new to datasets and could use some help with a formula. We have a numeric value that counts minute. I was hoping to use datasets to turn this into a timestamp or pretty HH:MM value. Any suggestions?
“…or make the hs_path column empty so that dynamic page for that row will not be generated.” --> that works, thank you <@UG52C29EE>!
